definition: Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.english: These works touched some sensitive issues in the former Soviet society.
sentences.chinese: 這些作品反映了原蘇聯當代社會上的一些敏感問題。

sentences.english: The old rulers of the Soviet Union were terrified of facing contested elections.
sentences.chinese: 原蘇聯的統治者們曾經是那麼地害怕公開競選。
